scrape away
𓎡 𓆑 𓂡 | strip away (of sail), clear (of sky), gather (flowers) | Finnish: kirkas
𓎡 𓆑 𓄿 𓄖 𓋳 𓂡 | strip away (of sail), clear (of sky), gather (flowers) |
⇔
𒍝𒆪 zaʳku | pure, clear ⋍ | Czech: čirý 𓎡 𓆑 𓂡 clear (of sky) > צָלוּל tzalul Finnish: kirkas
*ščirъ, from Proto-Indo-European *(s)kei̯ro-. Cognate with dialectal Russian щи́рый (ščíryj), Belarusian шчыры (ščyry), Ukrainian щи́рий (ščýryj), Polish szczery, Slovak číry

𒆪𒊓𒁍 ku-sa-pu
